item.text: “Brothers and fathers, listen to my defense that I now make to you.”

(When they <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he was <st data-num="4377" class="">addressing</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> in <st data-num="1446" class="">Aramaic</st>,<n id="3" /> they <st data-num="3930" class="">became</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">even</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2271">quieter</st>.)<n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="6" /> Paul <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st>,

“I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> a <st data-num="2453" class="">Jew</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5019" class="">Tarsus</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2791" class="">Cilicia</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="397" class="">brought up</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>, <st data-num="3811" class="">educated</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">with</st> <st data-num="195" class="">strictness</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3844" class="">under</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1059" class="">Gamaliel</st><n id="5" /> according to the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> of our <st data-num="3971" class="">ancestors</st>,<n id="6" /> and <st data-num="5225" class="">was</st><n id="7" /> <st data-num="2207" class="">zealous</st><n id="8" /> for <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4594" class="">today</st>.

I<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1377" class="">persecuted</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3598" class="">Way</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="891">even to the point of</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1195">tying up</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3860" class="">putting</st><n id="5" /> them <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st>,

<st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">both</st> the <st data-num="749">high priest</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3956" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="4244" class="">council of elders</st><n id="1" /> can <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st> about <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>. <st data-num="3844" class="">From</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">them</st><n id="2" /> I <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1209" class="">received</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1992" class="">letters</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1154" class="">Damascus</st>, and I was <st data-num="4198" class="">on</st> my <st data-num="4198" class="">way</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="71" class="">make arrests</st> <st data-num="1566" class="">there</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="71" class="">bring</st><n id="5" /> the <st data-num="1210" class="">prisoners</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="7" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> be <st data-num="5097" class="">punished</st>.

<st data-num="4198" class="">As</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4198" class="">en route</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1448" class="">near</st> <st data-num="1154" class="">Damascus</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="3314" class="">noon</st> a <st data-num="2425">very bright</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1810" class="">suddenly</st> <st data-num="4015" class="">flashed</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">around</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="5037" class="">Then</st> I<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1475" class="">ground</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> a <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="4549" class="">‘Saul</st>, <st data-num="4549" class="">Saul</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> are you <st data-num="1377" class="">persecuting</st> <st data-num="1473">me</st>?’

<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>, ‘<st data-num="5101">Who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are you</st>, <st data-num="2962">Lord</st>?’ He <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">‘I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> the <st data-num="3480" class="">Nazarene</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="1377">persecuting</st>.’

<st data-num="1161" class="">Those</st> who <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2300" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="191" class="">understand</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> of the one who was <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> I <st data-num="3004">asked</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘<st data-num="5101">What</st> should I <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st>, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>?’ The <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, ‘<st data-num="450">Get up</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1154" class="">Damascus;</st> <st data-num="2546" class="">there</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will be <st data-num="2980" class="">told</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> have been <st data-num="5021" class="">designated</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st>.’

<st data-num="5613" class="">Since</st> I could <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1689" class="">see</st> <st data-num="575">because of</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1391" class="">brilliance</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st>, I <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1154" class="">Damascus</st> <st data-num="5496">led by the hand</st> <st data-num="5259">of</st><n id="3" /> those who <st data-num="4895">were with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

A <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> named <st data-num="367" class="">Ananias</st>,<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="2126" class="">devout</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3140">well spoken</st> of <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> who <st data-num="2730" class="">live</st> there,<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2064" class="">came</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2186">stood beside</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, ‘<st data-num="80">Brother</st> <st data-num="4549" class="">Saul</st>, <st data-num="308" class="">regain</st> your <st data-num="308" class="">sight!’</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2504">And</st> at that <st data-num="846" class="">very</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">moment</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2504">I</st> <st data-num="308" class="">looked up</st> and <st data-num="308" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, ‘The <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st><n id="1" /> has already <st data-num="4400" class="">chosen</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st>, to <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="1342">Righteous One</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> a <st data-num="5456" class="">command</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st>,

<st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> you will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">witness</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> you have <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> are you <st data-num="3195">waiting for</st>?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="450">Get up</st>,<n id="2" /> be <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> have <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> <st data-num="628">washed away</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1941">calling on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3686">name</st>.’<n id="4" />

When<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="5290" class="">returned</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="4336" class="">praying</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411" class="">temple</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">into</st> a <st data-num="1611" class="">trance</st><n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, ‘<st data-num="4692">Hurry</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1831" class="">get out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st> <st data-num="5034">quickly</st> <st data-num="1360" class="">because</st> they will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3858" class="">accept</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1473">me</st>.’

<st data-num="2504">I</st> <st data-num="3004">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, they <st data-num="846" class="">themselves</st> <st data-num="1987" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="5439" class="">imprisoned</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1194" class="">beat</st> those <st data-num="2596">in the various</st> <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogues</st><n id="2" /> who <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">witness</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4736" class="">Stephen</st> was <st data-num="1632" class="">shed</st>,<n id="2" /> I <st data-num="846" class="">myself</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="2186">standing nearby</st>, <st data-num="4909" class="">approving</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5442" class="">guarding</st> the <st data-num="2440" class="">cloaks</st><n id="4" /> of those who were <st data-num="337" class="">killing</st> <st data-num="846">him</st>.’<n id="5" />
Then he said to me, ‘Go, because I will send you far away to the Gentiles.’”
The crowd was listening to him until he said this. Then they raised their voices and shouted, “Away with this man from the earth! For he should not be allowed to live!”

While <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> were <st data-num="2905" class="">screaming</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4496">throwing off</st> their <st data-num="2440" class="">cloaks</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="906" class="">tossing</st> <st data-num="2868" class="">dust</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="109" class="">air</st>,

the <st data-num="5506">commanding officer</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2753" class="">ordered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Paul</st><n id="2" /> to be <st data-num="1521">brought back</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3925" class="">barracks</st>.<n id="3" /> He <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> them<n id="4" /> to <st data-num="426" class="">interrogate</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Paul</st><n id="5" /> by <st data-num="3148" class="">beating</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3148" class="">with a lash</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> he could <st data-num="1921">find out</st> the <st data-num="156" class="">reason</st> the crowd<n id="7" /> was <st data-num="2019" class="">shouting</st> at <st data-num="846" class="">Paul</st><n id="8" /> <st data-num="3779">in this way</st>.

<st data-num="5613" class="">When</st> they had <st data-num="4385" class="">stretched</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4385" class="">out</st> for the <st data-num="2438">lash</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1543" class="">centurion</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2476">standing nearby</st>, “Is it <st data-num="1832" class="">legal</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="3147" class="">lash</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> who is a <st data-num="4514">Roman citizen</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="178" class="">without a proper trial</st>?”<n id="4" />

When the <st data-num="1543" class="">centurion</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this,<n id="2" /> he <st data-num="4334">went to</st> the <st data-num="5506">commanding officer</st><n id="3" /> and <st data-num="518" class="">reported</st> it,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> are you <st data-num="3195" class="">about</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st>?<n id="5" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="4514">Roman citizen</st>.”<n id="6" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="5506">commanding officer</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="3004">asked</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">Paul</st>,<n id="3" /> “<st data-num="3004">Tell</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, are <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> a <st data-num="4514">Roman citizen</st>?”<n id="4" /> He <st data-num="5346" class="">replied</st>,<n id="5" /> “<st data-num="3483">Yes</st>.”

The <st data-num="5506">commanding officer</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>, “<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2932" class="">acquired</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="4174" class="">citizenship</st> with a <st data-num="4183">large sum</st> of <st data-num="2774" class="">money</st>.”<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> was <st data-num="2532">even</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> a citizen,”<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="5346" class="">replied</st>.<n id="5" />
Then those who were about to interrogate him stayed away from him, and the commanding officer was frightened when he realized that Paul was a Roman citizen and that he had had him tied up.

The next day, because the commanding officer wanted to know the true reason Paul was being accused by the Jews, he released him and ordered the chief priests and the whole council to assemble. He then brought Paul down and had him stand before them.
